content.description: Which of the following correctly indicates how the current in the battery and the resistance of the resistor change, if at all, while the temperature is increasing?
content.question: Current in Battery Resistance of Resistor A Increase Increase B Increase Stay the same C Decrease Increase D Decrease Stay the same

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
